outputs.output_descr: UNDP, jointly with UNFPA and in coordination with the Ministry of Health are supporting the implementation of activities to addressing stigma and discrimination associated with most at risk populations (MAPRs) vulnerable to HIV/AIDs.

project_descr: UNDP, jointly with UNFPA and in coordination with the Ministry of Health, are supporting activities to addressing stigma and discrimination associated with most at risk populations (MAPRs) vulnerable to HIV/AIDs in Suriname.
